item.description:
If you don't already know and love David Wilcox's music, check him out on www. davidwilcox.com   - his songs are soulful and his voice is described as a warm baritone...he is a true poet-storyteller..

 

buy your own tix for $20 at www.meeandthee.org . or $22 at the door...

Let me know if you'd like to meet for a drink / snack before the show. (You can buy coffee and baked goodies at half time during the show..)
item.how_to_find_us: Meet there at 7.50 pm...unless you're coming to Jack Tar for dinner at 6. 30 pm. (Let me know)
item.why: Great music at the oldest coffeehouse around..
item.name: David Wilcox at the Me and Thee, Marblehead
